overview: He is chained to a spiral.  A spiral between post–rock bottom and pre-comeback.  And this is his reaction.
title: KETTENREAKTION

overview: Aashaan dreams of cinema until a 150-member film crew enters his life, bringing movie magic within reach. Chasing his big break, he confronts the industry's harsh realities.
title: Aashaan

overview: This story is centered around the Sri Ramaswamy Temple in the village of Ramanjira and the family home in Chemmangad, where the rituals of the templeare traditionally performed. Vasudevan Ezhuthachan, the head of the familyhome, was always a refuge for the villagers. The door was never closed to thosewho came hungry. However, it was his neighbor
title: Iniyum

overview: When France relinquished the colonial outpost of Pondicherry after India’s independence in 1947, it gave its subjects the option between French and Indian citizenships. Inadequately publicised, this voluntary path to enfranchisement failed to reach the vast majority of Pondicherry’s population, who became Indian citizens by default. A fraction of those left behind continue to fight for what they perceive to be their birthright.
title: To Die a Frenchman

overview: What starts off as a routine therapy session for Michael slowly turns out to be not what it seems.
title: The Conversation

overview: Mayilaa embarks on a journey as a travelling salesperson in Southern India to fulfil her expensive obligations. The only problem: she doesn’t know how to sell. A sharp yet heartwarming tale of a mother-daughter duo finding their feet on the road.
title: Mayilaa

overview: Unfolding over the course of a single night. It captures a fleeting phase in a young couple’s relationship — moments of closeness, uncertainty, and love, just before life pulls them in different directions.
title: Madras Kadhal

overview: RavanaRajyadalli Navadampathigalu is a Social Satirical drama set in the urban back drop of Bengaluru in areas where middle class population is high.. the story is about a newly married couple getting stuck into the cluthces of the social system they live in and how are they going to fight it is the film all about.
title: Raavana Rajyadalli Navadampathigalu

overview: Granny is an upcoming film directed by Vijaya Kumara, starring Vadivukkarasi, Dhileepan, Singampuli, Gaja Raja, Ananthu Nag, and Aparna in prominent roles.
title: Granny

overview: Amid the misty hills of Sakleshpur, Karnataka, Valavaara unfolds as a sweeping coming-of-age drama about brotherhood, loyalty, and the weight of responsibility. Kundeshi, a quiet boy from a struggling farming family, has always lived in the shadow of his younger brother, Kosudi - their father's clear favorite. When the boys take their pregnant cow out to graze, it vanishes into the countryside and tramples a neighbor's field, setting off a desperate search. With their father's return looming, Kundeshi must track down the animal before disaster strikes. His journey through rugged terrain and simmering family tensions forces him to confront his own insecurities and discover what it truly means to grow up. Lyrical and emotionally charged, Valavaara is a poignant portrait of rural childhood, responsibility, and the fragile bonds that hold families together.
title: Valavaara

overview: A beautiful family drama woven around a central theme of father daughter bond which emphasizes human emotions at its depths.A daughters wish to make her dad participate in a reality show singing competition forms the crux of this emotional family dramaThe story takes place in two different time lines which reflects all these emotions in a poetic harmony of love, ambition, failure, success and the wheel of life.
title: Mellisai

overview: Prashanthi gives up her dreams for love, only to fall into abusive relationships first with her lecturer and later with her husband, Omkar, who pretends to support her but turns violent and manipulative. After enduring trauma, betrayal, and a heartbreaking miscarriage, she secretly strengthens herself, escapes his control, and rebuilds her life by starting a successful business. When Omkar's abuse becomes public and reaches court, she refuses divorce, not out of love, but to ensure no other woman suffers the same fate
title: Om Shanti Shanti Shantihi

overview: A police officer being investigated for his role in a woman’s death rushes to save his son from her vengeful father.
title: Valathu Vashathe Kallan

overview: A group of students' lives are thrown into chaos after one of them is possessed by the spirit of an elderly woman.
title: Prakambanam

overview: During a national emergency, Anita finds herself isolated at home while facing personal challenges. As she adapts to the new reality, an unexpected situation tests her resilience and changes her perspective on life.
title: Lockdown

overview: Facing his final days and driven by one last wish, a cinephile clings to cinema, where passion turns dangerous and madness slowly finds its throne.
title: The Cinephile - Monarchy of Madness

overview: The journey of a young filmmaker who quits cinema after being diagnosed with heart cancer, setting out to make one final film—an intimate passage through spirituality, nature, and the essence of life.
title: Hopeless Heart

overview: A dark psychological drama about Z, a young therapist whose own inner turmoil destroys the very lives he’s meant to help and live with.
title: Sankee

overview: During the Sankranti festival celebrations, a matriarch and her housekeeper confront solitude through the intimacy of each other’s company.
title: O’Sey Balamma

overview: Two dumb, pretentious, good-for-nothing gangsters, Anna and Dhed Dimag along with Shiva are waiting for Mallesh's death news. All hell breaks loose when they get a visit from a Zombie, sorry Jaambie who happens to look like Mallesh... or... is the Jaambie, Mallesh himself?
title: Jaambie

overview: When two friends discover a cryptic box filled with ancient hints, they embark on a perilous journey across hidden landscapes to uncover a forgotten treasure — only to realize the greatest discovery is far different than what they expected.
title: Crimson blood

overview: Tulasi is a soulful Kannada music video by Sumedh K that blends gentle melodies with emotionally driven visuals. The song carries a calm, devotional undertone, using nature and intimate moments to explore themes of longing, purity, and inner reflection.
title: Tulasi

overview: A man who stopped believing in God after tragedy is guided back to faith through a mysterious event shaped by someone else's deep devotion .It's a journey of lost hope, the longing, and divine realization with thriller, mysterious journey.
title: Kattemar

overview: Mysterious mushrooms trigger odd events in Kanjikkuzhi village. Friends investigating their origin discover a web of folklore and scientific mysteries that challenge the boundary between natural and supernatural.
title: Magic Mushrooms

overview: The film is about an aspiring Director, who pitches her three different stories, that depict some pressing ideological and social issues in the society, to a producer with whom she also has an hidden agenda.
title: Hotspot 2 Much

overview: A content man's life turns chaotic when money fever strikes. His newfound greed leads to a series of amusing situations that unfold in this humorous tale.  For more info - https://pathwayproductions.in/
title: Carmeni Selvam

overview: In 14th century AD, people were suffering from the brutality of the Madurai Sultanate and the Delhi Sultan. The Hoysala Emperor Vallalar III protected his empire and people with diplomacy. The sacrifice and betrayal of some changed the course of a kingdom. Insidious interventions disrupt the lives of people and the stability of the state.
title: Dhraupathi 2

overview: When crime anchor Sandhya’s best friend is found dead under suspicious circumstances, she embarks on a dangerous investigation that collides with a dark past. As secrets unravel, Sandhya must face her trauma and rise as a fearless voice for the silenced.
title: Cheekatilo

overview: It was a special day in hospital attendant Sanal’s life: his wife, who had been working abroad for many years was finally coming home to be with him and their child, who she had missed dearly. Now their little family would be complete.
title: Baby Girl

overview: A man’s illusion of love turns tragic when misplaced desire and misunderstanding pull him into consequences he never anticipated.
title: Maayabimbum

overview: The war never ends—it only changes its battlefield, from power and pride to wealth, and now to health and humanity. COVID pushed the world into unseen trenches, where survival itself became a daily conflict and solitude a shared emotion.
title: Sandhya Nama Upasate

overview: Pankaja, along with her daughter, Lalli, searches for her missing husband through the city slums of Bangalore to bring him back home.
title: Pankaja

original_title: ചത്താ പച്ച: The Ring of Rowdies
overview: In the heart of Fort Kochi, three brothers and their crew of unlikely misfits stumble into the wild world of WWE-style costumed wrestling. What begins as a scrappy hustle soon explodes into a riot of masks, egos, and full-blown madness, all set against the backdrop of a city that never plays by the rules. But can their brotherhood survive when the real fight begins outside the ropes?
title: Chatha Pacha: The Ring of Rowdies

overview: Shankravva is the Four months pregnant wife of Yamunya, a poor weaver from ilkal, a town in Karnataka. Despite her extreme poverty, She longs to wear the silk sarees she has woven for thousands of people.
title: Seragu

overview: However, the results indicate a horror-comedy telemovie titled Du Ri Me (often indexed under social media, specifically Instagram, around late 2025/early 2026) arriving as a Pongal special in January 2026.
title: Du.Ri.Me

overview: A neglected wife flees with her young son and a seemingly kind driver, seeking a better life. But when she discovers the man's true predatory nature, she must fight to protect her son from a horrifying fate.
title: Randam Mukham

overview: This movies follows the fun journey of a group of boys of Kanimangalam Kovilakam Hostel
title: Kanimangalam Kovilakam

overview: A village official attending a wedding becomes entangled in an escalating family dispute over power and old resentments, testing his leadership as he tries to contain the situation.
title: Thalaivar Thambi Thalaimaiyil

overview: Two strangers uncover a hidden child trafficking and exploitation network operating in plain sight. As they risk everything to protect innocent lives, an unexpected bond grows between them. A gripping story of courage, compassion, and love born in the fight for justice.
title: Gamer

overview: A lazy, entitled brat who wants to lead an easy life is in for a rude shock that changes the course of his life.
title: Anaganaga Oka Raju

overview: After being raised as the reincarnation of a famous actor, a man finds himself clashing with his grandfather's expectations of him.
title: Vaa Vaathiyaar

overview: What begins as a casual fling between a married man, Ram a.k.a Satya and Manasa in the middle of an international business trip, balloons into an out-of-the-blue mess when the latter lands in Hyderabad, disrupting Ram’s otherwise stable marriage with Balamani.
title: Bhartha Mahasayulaku Wignyapthi

overview: National security officer Vara Prasad, protecting his estranged wife and kids from a vengeful ex-cop, sees it as a chance to rebuild their relationship after six years apart.
title: Mana ShankaraVaraPrasad Garu

overview: A group of men realize that they are all the victim of the same serial wedding scammer.
title: Pennu Case

overview: Nancy came to the UK from Kerala to work as a nurse, and her husband Tony accompanied her as a dependent. Tony, who was a civil engineer in his home country, believed he could earn a good income by finding a job in civil engineering in the UK.
title: Ennittu Enthayi

overview: In a time of civil disobedience in the erstwhile Madras state, a ruthless intelligent officer turns up with a duty to track down rebels. Chezhian and his brother Chinndurai are of different personalities, one a hardworking fireman, the other a rebel. A deadly game of cat and mouse ensues as Chezhian is forced to abandon his peaceful ways to protect his people and takes on the mighty forces, culminating in a fierce battle for justice.
title: Parasakthi

overview: Seeking his lost grandfather, a young man enters a haunted mansion and awakens a family curse powerful enough to upend both his life and reality.
title: The Rajasaab

overview: In a world where everyone is expected to be on point 24/7, life isn’t lived anymore — it’s performed.  Always grinding.  Always proving.  Always “doing fine”.  But the mind keeps score.  And when it can’t take it anymore…  the body hits pause.  JEEVA is a social satire on today’s pressure culture — where being human is replaced by being perfect, and panic attacks are just the body’s way of saying: slow down. breathe. exist.
title: JEEVA

overview: A Middle class boy Pavan decide to go for his rich friend's party but his mom didn't give money for that, and he get betrayal by his friends. Then a poor kid changed his character in that hard situation. The kid made him to realise, live your life with what you had.
title: Asaiyum Anubavamum

overview: An anthology film centered on the divine grace and miracles of Sri Sathya Sai Baba, showcasing how faith transforms lives, featuring stories of a mischievous man's redemption and a village facing floods, emphasizing universal love and divinity, not a specific religion
title: Anantha

overview: "With You" follows Jagan and Sathya, a couple caught between salary pressure, age, marriage expectations, and self-worth. When Jagan believes he isn’t “ready” for love because life isn’t settled, Sathya chooses something different — understanding, patience, and partnership.
title: With You

overview: A rough person from madurai, an educated person from thiruchchi, and a curiosity disorder person from chennai and there was a situation where these three persons had to fall in love with two elder sisters and one younger sister. and there was competition and challenges arise but the rest of the story was about whom the sisters will fall in love and get married. this is a full-length comedy film and love story named kaaka.
title: Kaakaa

overview: Jeni and priyanka are best friends andambitious medical students with dreams of making a difference in the world.their bond is unbreakable. however, their lives take a tragic turn when jenigets brutally raped and dies unexpectedly. devastated by the loss, priya isconsumed by grief and anger. she decides to seek justice for her friend'suntimely death. as she navigates the complex legal process, she becomesincreasingly disillusioned with the system and status quo.
title: Justice for Jeni

overview: Entire Story takes place over a single night. It revolves around Jansi and her 8yr old child, who gets trapped between third world war tensions and dangereous men Lal Chetta, Khan Bhai & Ranga Reddy. These men far more dangerous than wild animals. The Note film thrillingly portraits by how Jansi uses her intelligence to escape and bring everything to an end.
title: Anali

overview: Saraswathipuram is a Village,where Education is Well Valued.nilakanta Work as a Tailor in That Village.nilakanta is Wise and Good From Childhood, He Believes in Karma but Unfortunately Karma Curses Him, No Matter How Big an Opponent He is,he Fights Bravely for His Life.who is That Rival ?
title: Nilakanta

overview: After a series of heartbreaks, a man finally finds solace in a mannequin, and he doesn't know what's in store for them.
title: Sakkani Bomma

overview: A popular travel vlogger, Prithvi, uncovers a dark secret about his own family. His search for the truth leads him to his estranged father, setting him on a journey of self-discovery.  Does Prithvi Find Closure? Does Destination Meet Destiny?
title: Theertharoopa Thandeyavarige

overview: This Film is the Prequel story of The Movie "Convergence" which is yet to be released on 6th of June 2026.
title: Convergence : The Prequel

overview: Siddharth's life is a string of misfortunes, losing love, money, and dignity, making him the unwitting star of a slum-based comedy of errors. Hope only reappears in the form of Shravya, a no-nonsense single mother. However, just as Siddharth begins to rebuild his life and pursue a chance at love, his past resurfaces to threaten everything.
title: Psych Siddhartha

overview: It is about two individuals in the city of somewhere near by you
title: KUDA -A LITTLE WHILE

overview: When a string of high-profile murders rocks the city, investigators uncover a dark secret linking the victims to an unspeakable crime. But even after the alleged killer is caught, the killings don’t stop—revealing a far deeper conspiracy where justice comes at a deadly price.
title: Valluvan

overview: A group of friends discover that there is a class difference among them, where some cannot afford the activities others enjoy, when spending time together. They sit around a table that quickly turns into a battleground, where they bluntly argue it out.
title: The Split

overview: What begins as a happy reunion for Arjun and Navya quickly turns dark when a private video is leaked, and an unknown caller uses it to blackmail them. Trapped by him, Arjun is pushed into doing crimes. As love, fear, and guilt collide. Will the truth finally come out, or will the unseen enemy win once again?
Bloody Christmas is a mystery-driven thriller where silence follows violence and secrets refuse to stay buried.
title: Bloody Christmas

overview: Three friends bond and their coming of age graph against a backdrop of kite-flying as a sports event.
title: Patang

overview: An ex-couple reconnects via a late-night FaceTime call. As memories resurface, unspoken truths come to light. Their conversation unearths lingering emotions, blurring the line between closure and nostalgia.
title: Pesaa Varigal

overview: Four friends set out to challenge blind beliefs, only to be drawn into a mysterious spiritual encounter that changes their lives forever.
title: Eesha

overview: When a meteor crashes into the highly superstitious village of Shambhala in the 1980s, strange supernatural events unfold, forcing an atheist scientist to face an ancient horror-one that science can't explain or escape.
title: Shambhala

overview: Francis' father raises his voice for an important issue and ends up being killed by those involved in the issue. In this situation, Francis keeps himself away from everything, thinking that his sister's life is more important than avenging the people who killed his father. One day, his sister's husband gets into trouble with the gang. To save him, Francis turns into a complete beast and takes revenge on all those who caused his father's death.
title: FRANCIS: Chapter-1

overview: When a serious incident puts a university and its students at risk, a stoic lecturer devises a plan to protect them.
title: Aghosham

overview: Mark is suspended from his police duties for his unruly yet effective ways of operating, but when 18 children are abducted and found dead, races to catch the criminals. With only 18 hours left, he must confront powerful foes and use unconventional tactics to succeed.
title: Mark

overview: As he transfers a young convict from prison to court, a police officer learns about the chain of events that led to the young man's conviction for violence.
title: Sirai

overview: A man who loses his belief in God meets the spirit of a young woman unable to remember what happened to her.
title: Sarvam Maya

overview: An aspiring football star desperately seeks a way to travel to England to play for a famous team, but his journey leads him to a village waging a bloody conflict.
title: CHAMPION

overview: Kaali, a struggling Pondicherry orphan encounters his rich Goa doppelganger Malpe Upendra with criminal past, leading to identity swaps and messy consequences. Corrupt cop Thiraviyam and Upendra’s enemies soon conspire to put that to an end.
title: Retta Thala

overview: A captivating new project by Suraj Production and the Magical Composer’s Debut film, #45Themovie is set to redefine the cinema-watching experience with its unique narrative and compelling performances.

The protagonist, Asif, and his friends Vijay and AB are artists who perform rap at weddings and small events in a village called Kadalundi, adjacent to the city of Kozhikode. While performing rap at their friends wedding, Asif sees a beautiful girl there, but he falls in love with her at first sight, but is un able to find out who she is or where
title: Haal

overview: What happens if two sworn enemies from a previous life are reborn as father-son in a new birth?
title: Vrusshabha

overview: A man and woman navigate the highs and lows of a long-distance relationship.
title: Mindiyum Paranjum

overview: During  2020's pandemic lock down, Akhilan, a lonely, innocent man gets mysterious theats and cries from unknown people saying that they don't want to be killed by him. Is he able to find out who are all these people and why they are all saying this to him?
title: Kadhaikalaamaa

overview: In a remote village, over a single day, four characters respond differently to the death of an upper-caste man named Shivaji.
title: Dhandoraa

overview: In Bengaluru, a stunt artist runs a Stunt Training School for orphaned children, treating them as his own family. His life is brightened by Ramya, the heroine, whose love adds depth to the story.  Meanwhile, terrorists plan a bomb blast. Children from the school stumble upon the plot and are kidnapped to Kashmir, prompting the hero and heroine to race to save them.
title: Raktha Kashmira

overview: Pandi, a small-time goon, exists on the periphery of power, of morality, of consequence. A single incident with his boss ruptures the fragile order of his life. Time bends, causality dissolves, and actions no longer arrive with clear reasons or outcomes. As violence unfolds with defiant chaos, Pandi turns inward, interrogating guilt, instinct, and the illusion of choice. In the collapse of meaning, he begins to understand that becoming something more than he was is less about survival and more about reckoning.
title: The Order Of Time

overview: A path to self discovery where the line between reality and inner voice blurs.
title: Unnai Arindhaal

overview: A rootless young man grappling with his past faces a pivotal moment where goals, memories, and relationships intersect. New encounters challenge his perspective, pushing him to examine his identity and future path.
title: Mario

overview: An orphan discovers her neighbor's seemingly perfect life is a lie.
title: Sahakutumbaanam

overview: When tragedy strikes twice, Bhavya refuses to remain a victim. Visually impaired, she is drawn into a perilous hunt for the truth behind the mysterious deaths of her husband & twin sister - uncovering a dark world where nothing is as it seems.
title: Divya Drushti

overview: The Movie Starts with a flashback where beautiful visuals of a mother feeding her daughter Shifting to present day there are two youngsters ‘ Sandeep ’ and ‘ Melvin ’ who have a brotherly relationship. Melvin is in love with ‘ Eliza ’ whom he met 2 months back online. He is requesting ‘ Sandeep ’ to accompany him to meet his love forthe first time
title: ELIZA

overview: Having a miserable past of being evacuated from their homeland and losing their livelihood, Rokkapuli and Pandi are among the main people of the village who aspire to become millionaires by peddling ganja (marijuana). Can they successfully achieve their dream?
title: Kombuseevi

overview: A devout Muslim girl from a strict family falls for a middle-class Christian boy and the couple's fight against cultural boundaries and her father’s wrath to keep their love alive.
title: Saviyum Suharayum

overview: A mysterious con man curates a team to swap a dead body from a grave. Chaos follows over a botched plan, royal family members, and secrets that can threaten people in power.
title: Gurram Paapi Reddy

overview: When tragedy strikes twice, Bhavya refuses to remain a victim. Visually impaired, she is drawn into a perilous hunt for the truth behind the mysterious deaths of her husband & twin sister - uncovering a dark world where nothing is as it seems.
title: Un Paarvayil

overview: After the Chief Minister of Kerala is kidnapped, a determined investigator is brought in to track down the mysterious abductor, uncovering hidden motives and secrets behind the crime.
title: Bha. Bha. Ba.

overview: They serve time travel with coffee but only until it turns cold. In those warm, borrowed minutes, Marun revisits his last memory with Rupika, a love that never learned how to stay.
title: Aadi Pona Aavani

overview: Arun, a transgender man in his twenties, is trapped in an abusive relationship with his boyfriend, Madhu. Estranged from his family, Arun struggles to navigate a society that refuses to accept him. Fear and isolation keep him from living openly, but his friendship with Padma, a lesbian colleague at the textile shop, becomes a quiet source of strength. As their bond deepens, Padma’s unwavering support helps Arun find the courage to embrace his truth and reclaim his place in the world.
title: Stolen Skies

overview: A young ghostwriter finds his quiet life at a remote estate suddenly disrupted when he encounters a woman who has suffered a terrible ordeal. As they navigate the aftermath together, their shared experience creates an unexpected bond that challenges them both in profound ways. This atmospheric character drama explores how two strangers, brought together by circumstance, discover strength and connection in the face of life's darkest moments.
title: Sheshippu

overview: Deepak and Devika, a seemingly perfect IT couple, celebrate their 4th wedding anniversary with close friends. However, the evening takes an unexpected turn when Deepak's girlfriend arrives, exposing his infidelity. The revelation sparks a heated confrontation, revealing extramarital affairs of Devika and other friends.Yet, as they come to terms with their own hypocrisy, they share a moment of raw honesty.
title: The Banquet Of Primal Love

overview: In a home suffocating under the weight of a shared trauma, Alwin and Priya’s marriage has slipped into a bitter cycle of anger and avoidance. When Priya’s torment suddenly gives way to an eerie change, Alwin’s unease turns to fear; her change feels unnatural, almost inhuman. His search for answers leads him to a secret buried beneath. To understand the stranger his wife has become, Alwin must confront that same void and risk losing himself to it.
title: The Coffin

overview: A writer's old age is marked by loneliness, where only his characters keep him company. His entire living world becomes his relatives. The film explores this journey through three famous short stories: T. Padmanabhan's "Poocchakkuttikalude Veedu" (The House of Kittens) and "Naykkalukalum Manushyarum" (Dogs and Humans), and Rene Basin's French story, "Thapal Pettiyile Kuruvikal" ( Birds in the Postbox).
title: All The Living

overview: Nari Monchan, from a secluded tribe, grapples with dwindling female presence, possessiveness in marriage, and revelations about his father that unravel his beliefs. As he confronts ancestral traditions and the legacy of the Indian Emergency, his journey becomes a search for identity, shaped by personal fears and buried truths. The film explores the fragile balance between tradition, desire, and self-discovery. This is the first film in Cholanaikka language spoken by the eponymous cave people.
title: Life of a Phallus

overview: In the quiet, parched summer of rural Kerala, the death of Korappan, the aged patriarch of a sprawling joint family, becomes the catalyst for a poignant reckoning. As family members rejoins for the death ceremonies for 16 days, several tension arises between them regarding property, consumption of water from a family well, love relationships and social tensions.
title: Celebration of Death

overview: In a bid to escape the grip of law and punishment, Shanu, a man with secret schemes, ensnares Amala - a woman grappling with psychological struggles. Together on a stolen bike, they embark on a journey where some desires are abandoned, while others reach completion.
title: Desire

overview: OAK is the story of two rival sisters, Sheela (elder) & Neethu. Both are victims of a dysfunctional family and are failure in forming healthy social relationships. Sheela is suffering from borderline personality disorder (BPD). She messes up everything and is insecure about her relationships. Her actions are often self-sabotaging. Neethu is a dopehead and is eccentric in nature. She is rebellious outside but broken inside. The time loop setting in the story serves as a metaphor in OAK.
title: OAK

overview: David has spent days without sleep, craving someone to talk to. One night, a lost traveler arrives at his door. David insists he stay, and their small talk begins. But what starts as a way to calm his anxiety soon grows into something far beyond his control.
title: Await

overview: A elite restaurant divided by a single wall, workers toil in silence like slaves, while elites feast on “the gods’ favourite food.” One woman among the slaves adds a mysterious liquid to the eternal dish 'Ambrosia', triggering chaos among the guests. Emotions erupt, relationships collapse. As the illusion shatters, the enslaved rise and walk out. Ambrosia is a tale of rupture, rebellion, and reclaiming voice in a world built on silence.
title: Ambrosia

overview: In the battle between love and lust, a tribal man fights to save his deaf and mute girlfriend from a ruthless forest officer, unravelling cat and mouse drama within the heart of the forest.
title: Mowgli

overview: Adarsh and Maria, a married couple, appear to share the warmth and freedom of close friends. When Maria's male friend, Sidharth, grows more attached, it has a distinct impact on Adarsh. Subsequently, Adarsh finds himself disturbed and distressed. 'Ebb' delves into the ways love, emotions and their various nuances influence both women and men.
title: Ebb

overview: Lord Ayyappa takes human form to stop terrorists targeting a major temple. The National Anti-Terrorist Squad and Indian Army launch a joint operation to counter the planned attack.
title: Sree Ayyappan

overview: A quiet life spirals into chaos when a woman discovers that a murder victim in her neighbourhood shares her identity
title: A Few Risible People

overview: "I think Gods, watching me what I become"
title: Veena Saraswathi

overview: A polio-stricken shepherd, Mariyappan, learns of his mother’s death and undertakes a harsh journey home with only a goat for support. Blocked by caste discrimination and crushed by poverty, he pushes through heat and humiliation
title: Pechi

overview: In a village bound by the shackles of untouchability and superstition,  a courageous teacher and  his students embark on a perilous quest for social justice, sparking a revolution that will transform their lives and their village forever.  In the heart of rural India, a heroic educator dares to challenge the status quo , inspiring a movement that will awaken a community  and the villain to its own power and demand change. As they fight for their rights and confront the entrenched forces of oppression, they ignite a beacon of hope that will illuminate a brighter future.But will their courageous be enough to overcome the darkness of the past, or will the shadows of oppression silence their voices forever?  This will be the climax of the movie.
title: Yaru Potta Kodu

overview: When a powerful media tycoon becomes the target of an anonymous hacker, his world begins to collapse. What starts as a cyberattack soon escalates into a high-stakes battle threatening his reputation, wealth, and loved ones. Trapped in a deadly mind game, he must fight back before everything he owns is destroyed.
title: Drive

overview: Mahasenha is a mythological jungle thriller set in the mystichills of Kurangani, where an ancient Yaali sculpture, worshipped by the tribal villagers as a divine protector, becomes the center of a high-stakes conflict. The film delivers a powerful message : Faith is not just belief-its protection.
title: Mahasenha

overview: When all hope died, Akhanda arrived. He saved his family, protected his people, killed the wrongdoers, and retreated into isolation. But years later, new threats emerge putting the world in danger. And as the world burns, Akhanda returns.
title: Akhanda 2: Thaandavam

overview: Rajashekar (Chief Minister of Karnataka) is framed, so his secretary recruits Krishna, a kindhearted lookalike, to impersonate the violent heir Dhanush. When the real Dhanush returns, both men clash for political power and Rukmini’s love. Krishna must protect Rukmini from Dhanush while also rising as a leader the people trust.
title: The Devil

overview: Uduppu follows the emotional and turbulent journey of a young woman whose life takes unexpected turns after marriage.
title: Uduppu

overview: A peace-loving social reformer is pushed to his breaking point by a relentless gang, forcing him to unleash a buried side of himself to protect those he cares about.
title: Rider

overview: The story of a bear that has lost its home and is trying to adjust in his new house.
title: Oo Banti gaadi Katha

overview: Lonely and desperate, an elderly matriarch will go to any length to be reunited with her beloved granddaughter.
title: Bhoothayanam

overview: Half Boil is a short film about a writer torn between his artistic vision and the commercial demands imposed by his producer.
title: Half Boil

overview: A Thriller Sentimental Story dealing with a son's love to a single mother. An unimaginable sacrifice done between friendship and love in this decade.
title: Saaraa

overview: a slow-moving short film designed as a visual and philosophical meditation. Each chapter is dedicated to one of the four Purusarthas
title: Geethai

overview: The hero works in a private company, the heroine is looking for a job after finishing college, that two meet in reality and then hero fall in love with the help of friends, the hero's uncle is beaten up by the villain in an accident then there is a clash between the villain and the hero, in the meantime the heroine tells the hero that you are not friendly, love mood,don't be friends with me and leaves, in that sadness he decides to commit suicide and  when he tries to do so, something  unexpected happens, Mottai Rajendran comes in the form of a Ghost and prevents his death because he  too committed suicide, this is the plot of the screenplay.The message is don't commit suicide.
title: Konja Naal Poru Thaliva

overview: Kutty and Meena lost their parents in the tsunami and live with their grandmother in Kannagi Nagar. Meena is kidnapped by 5 boys. He falls unconscious thinking that meena has raped and killed. With the help of a demented young charity founder, he survives and murders five people. Later, knowing that Meena is alive, he goes to Thailand in search of the meena and finds meena. But Meena scolds the kutti and sends him away asking him to be good. Because of meena decision kutti kill himself at one construction site.
title: Kannagi Nagar

overview: A psychiatrist evaluating a self-confessed serial killer unravels a twisted web of trauma, deceit, and psychological manipulation—only to question if the killer is truly guilty or just another victim in a larger, darker game.
title: Stephen

overview: After being released from prison for a murder he did not commit, a man quickly learns that crime and injustice are still rife in his hometown.
title: Pongala

overview: Early 2010s. A routine Kerala Police inquiry in the quiet village of Kottayikonam takes an unexpected turn when a trail of seemingly minor clues unravels into a string of disturbing cases. The investigation soon crosses into Tamil Nadu, revealing unsolved mysteries that have lingered for years.
title: Kalamkaval

overview: A chef-in-disguise assassin from Japan and a Kerala cop converge on one colony, each pursuing the same target with their own motives.
title: CHAKRAVYUH

overview: A breezy tale of love!
title: Joe's Cafe

overview: A couple wants to name their would-be child "Clouds".
title: Moda Moda

overview: A grieving boatman and an earnest meteorologist share their knowledge of the seas and weather, but find themselves helpless in the face of unpredictable climate.
title: The Prediction

overview: When Father Choma's dream of securing farmland fails, his son Kaala, from a marginalised community, vows to overcome all odds to honour his father's legacy.
title: Do you know about the Warrior with a Sword

overview: Mani, a determined gangster seeking revenge for his brothers death, sets out to kill Jagan, a feared local don. But when his trusted ally Gopi jeopardizes the plan, Mani abandons the mission to protect him. Forced into hiding, Mani finally reveals the painful truth of how his brother was killed six months ago, setting the stage for a tense journey fueled by loyalty, loss and vengeance.
title: FRIDAY

original_title: Not All Movies Are the Same: Dual
overview: After losing everything to a personal mistake, a young man stumbles into a parallel world where a family is trapped by zombies. Driven to save them, he must navigate this deadly reality and fight for survival-and redemption
title: Not All Movies Are the Same: Dual

overview: Thangam is an honest doctor working at Pennery Hospital. He has a sister named Selvi and a brother named Stalin. Arnold, a villain from Kasimedu area,Through this, Thangams brother Stalin is killed. The story revolves around whether Thangam did a postmortem on Bharathis body.
title: BP 180

overview: Flirt is a romantic-comedy-thriller centered around a young man (portrayed by Chandan Kumar) whose life intertwines with love, friendship and emotional chaos. The film explores relationships, romance and unexpected twists in an entertaining blend of humour, drama and heart. Performances especially by the lead pair are highlighted as the film’s strongest aspect.
title: Flirt

overview: Gunasekaran drives his own car. Anbu and Kanimozhi fall in love. In order to prevent the Chief Ministers video from getting out, Chief Minister Assistant and Inspector Muthu Karupan kills a young man. They put the blame on Gunasekar. This story is about how Anbu saves Gunasekaran from this.
title: IPL

overview: A woman must use her intelligence and grit to protect her family after they are unexpectedly caught in the crossfire of gang violence.
title: Revolver Rita

overview: A crew of five amateur thieves reunite for one final score in a village brimming with elections. With no experience and only a reckless plan, things dont go as expected.  Will they make it out, or will the village remember them only as five fools who gambled with fate?
title: Bank Of Bhagyalakshmi

overview: Rajini and Maina Elope From Their Village and End Up Hitching a Ride With a Stranger And a Petty Thief Whose Stolen Thali They Use for a Hurried Wedding. But Their New Life Takes a Bizarre Turn When Maina Becomes Possessed by the Ghost of Ponnarasi. Seeking Help From a Local Priest, Rajini Discovers That the Spirit Wants Revenge for a Past Betrayal Tied to the Thali. As Twists Unfold, Rajini and His Friends Must Uncover the Truth and Save Maina From the Vengeful Ghost’s Deception.
title: Rajini Gaang

overview: A heartfelt tribute to fan culture, the story follows Sagar, an ardent fan whose life, relationships, and identity revolve around his admiration for his cinematic idol, 'Andhra King' Surya Kumar.
title: Andhra King Taluka

overview: In a college canteen, two students find themselves caught in a quiet confusion that blurs the line between order and reality.
title: Disorder

overview: An unexplored love story before the silence!
title: Hrudhaya

overview: Srinu, a directionless 30-year-old, falls for perfect neighbor Manaswini. As he transforms himself to win her love, her father gives him one month to prove his worth, but mishaps complicate his journey.
title: Itlu Me Yedhava

overview: A corporate worker's impulsive decision to leave her desk job leads to a transformative solo adventure, where strangers become friends and comfort zones fade into distant memories.
title: Yellow

overview: When writer Jeba is murdered at midnight, the calm of an upscale apartment complex shatters. Inspector Magudapathi, known for his unorthodox methods, delves into the residents' secrets to uncover the truth. Amid the chaos, Adhi`s growing bond with his mother's therapist, Meera, complicates everything. Mufti Police is a tense thriller where every neighbor hides a motive and the truth is darker than anyone expects.
title: Mufti Police

overview: Poonga is a Tamil movie written and directed by KP Tanasekar.
title: Poonga

overview: When Chotu`s surprise party for his don father ends in tragedy, he inherits the criminal empire and uncovers his uncle Murthy`s deceit. Meanwhile, Kittu, a struggling cab driver pretending to be deaf, becomes entangled in danger after unknowingly helping twin murderers.
title: Paanch Minar

overview: Murugesan+2 is a darkly comic tale about Murugesan, a truck driver leading a secret double life with two families. When he is presumed dead after a severe accident, a promised settlement sparks a bitter feud between his wives and their families, each scheming for control of the money. Just as the battle turns vicious, Murugesan returns alive, only to become a burden to those who once mourned him. Faced with betrayal and greed, Murugesan and his disillusioned sons walk away, leaving behind a biting satire on family, loyalty, and the corrupting power of money.
title: Murugesan +2

overview: Raju Weds Rambai is inspired by a real story of a carefree band drummer whose love for a compounders daughter triggers a clash of ego and honour, turning their sweet village romance into an emotional journey filled with conflict, pain, and ultimately redemption.
title: Raju Weds Rambai

overview: This World is Sleeping in the Darkness of Websites.in Such a Situation, the Direction of One's Life Changes...i Can't Bear It. The Story is What He Wakes Up Like the Eyes of the Night to Correct This World That is Sleeping on the Web in That Anger.
title: Iravin Vizhigal

overview: "Shades of Life" is an introspective and melancholic anthology that threads together different stories, all set against the backdrop of Indian village life
title: Shades Of life

overview: Karl Marx, a middle-class man in his mid-forties, lives in a small housing board quarters with his mouthy wife and his two kids. As long as he can remember Karl Marx had only one dream, to buy a couple of acres of land in his native village and do farming. This middle-class man with his middle-class dream gets a reversal of fortune because of a good deed done by his father in the past. That being a cheque for an amount of one crore rupees. But fate plays a cruel trick on Karl Marx as he misplaces the cheque and struggles to find it. He has only two days to find the missing cheque and encash it. Does he find it? Does he fulfil his dream? The story that unfolds is Middle Class
title: Middle Class

overview: Full Meals movie touches upon Love, Life, and Passion. In the Film, protagonist is a struggling Wedding Photographer who tries to attain his passion and prove himself. In this process he gets entangled in his personal and love life
title: Full Meals

overview: A chilling murder, a young witness, and two unlikely heroes pulled into a perilous game. With a ruthless mafia closing in, they embark on a daring mission to protect the innocent and hunt down those responsible. This action-packed thriller delivers tension, courage and nonstop excitement from start to finish.
title: The Task

overview: When easygoing Karthik falls head over heels for his charming neighbour, he thinks love is simple. But the closer he gets, the more tangled his world becomes, full of hidden truths, shocking lies, and unexpected twists
title: 12A Railway Colony

overview: A new bride's happiness is put to the test when she notices her husband's suspicious behaviour.
title: Premante

overview: 440 crores stolen. Seven days to get it back. A game of greed, betrayal and intrigue culminates in an explosive climax in this story of a greedy man, a conniving woman and an uncanny guy with a bag full of tricks.
title: Mask

overview: Mothers, children, sisters, and ordinary revolutionaries frequently make huge personal sacrifices in the fight for the right to live equally under the law. 'Janata Bar' is the story of one such woman who fought for justice.
title: Janata Bar

overview: In the misty hills of Kaattukunnu, an aging woman and her servant boy struggle to survive the ghosts of the past, as the hunt for Kuriachan — a legendary dog breeder and outlaw — blurs the line between myth, memory, and vengeance, revealing that even in absence, he still rules the hills.
title: Eko

overview: An Investigative Police officer teams up with an autism school teacher to solve the mystery of a cruel murder happened in a school for autistic children.
title: Theeyavar Kulaigal Nadunga

overview: In the secluded hills of Marayur, a region steeped in the scent and lore of sandalwood, Vilayath Buddha unfolds as a potent character drama anchored in pride, memory, and resistance.
title: Vilaayath Budha

overview: Set in Bengaluru’s restless chaos of fading tongues, simmering pride, and the dark seduction of violence, a young pro-Kannada activist battles his alter ego while dreaming of a fantasy city where his language reigns eternal.
title: Kokila

overview: Sarakka, a lady don determined to avenge her long-lost enemy, unexpectedly finds herself preparing for the IELTS to catch him, setting off a hilarious and heartwarming ride through pride, power, and pronunciation.
title: EGO

overview: Someone explores the quiet spaces between memory, longing and silence. Crafted with restraint and emotional depth, the film reflects on the moments we hold close and the words that remain unspoken.
title: Aaro

overview: Mohana is the president of the first trade union for women auto rickshaw drivers in the southeast Indian state of Tamil Nadu. As well as maneuvering her own auto through the busy streets of Chennai, she has to navigate a sexist and patriarchal system to secure equal opportunities for women drivers. She faces constant resistance—with conflicts and humiliations every day.
title: Auto Queens

overview: A gust brings with it more than just wind, kicking up a whirlwind of confusion for three unsuspecting bachelors and a young woman determined to find her lost laundry.
title: Bra

original_title: Eighth Hill - A Sacred Revolution: Tirupati's Dream without Plastic
overview: Deep in the sacred Tirumala Hills, where millions walk in devotion, one man walks with a different purpose.  This documentary introduces Shivaji Paleti - an unsung hero who has dedicated his life to protect the hills from plastic pollution. With bare hands and endless patience, he cleans, he preserves, and he teaches what true devotion towards Mother Earth means. His perseverance never faded away despite numerous hardships. A true modern-day warrior who led the "Plastic Free Tirupati" movement with an example, turning personal conviction into a collective awakening.  The "Eighth Hill" stands as a reflection of our own atrocities. An unsettling mirror showing how what we dismiss as a single piece of trash can grow into a mountain of consequence. Through Shivaji’s story, this film explores not just environmental preservation, but the deeper meaning of responsibility, faith, and humanity’s bond with nature.
title: Eighth Hill - A Sacred Revolution: Tirupati's Dream without Plastic

overview: Akshay finds himself in a hilarious mess when he falls in love with two girls at the same time, without either of them knowing. To make things worse, his strict father is completely against love. Now, Akshay must juggle both sides, hide the truth, and somehow escape the chaos hes created.
title: Love OTP

overview: Gatha Vaibhava is a fantasy drama that weaves together history, mythology, and destiny. When Purathan and Adhunika meet in the present, they embark on a mystical journey through their past lives from the divine realms of Devaloka to Vasco da Gama's voyage and the coastal lands of pre-independence Karnataka. As echoes of the past resurface, they must unravel their fate. Will love endure across lifetimes, or is history doomed to repeat itself?
title: Gatha Vaibhava

overview: The story revolves around four friends embarking on an unexpected road trip in a rusty Maruti 800.
title: Jigris

overview: In Bijapur,an orphaned auto driver falls in love and follows a girl into college,where playful revenge against bullies takes many twists—yet can the wisdom of the city’s monuments turn conflict into love,respect,and harmony?
title: Udaala

overview: Three young mechanics move their bike repair workshop to an isolated homestay rumoured to be haunted - only to encounter chilling, unexplained events that soon come to life and cannot be ignored.
title: Nidhiyum Bhoothavum

overview: The protagonist Sathya from Simhabettu finds himself in a dilemma after he finds out the truth behind the people he trusted the most.
title: JAI

overview: Selvam and Shyamala who is living in the city has a long time dream of building a small and simple house  of their own. Real estate broker Kannaiya assists them in buying a plot in the suburbs while scheming his  own plot. The story revolves around the fate of Selvam and Shyamala's dream home.
title: Irul Inithu (Mirk)

overview: Bhumi sees an elephant in the jungle growing up without his others love. His teacher advises him to love nature and protect the birds and animals in the forest and live in harmony with them and he decided to protect the elephant. The broker offers the elephant as a sacrifice for the ministers post. Hearing this, Bhumi fights with them.
title: Kumki 2

overview: A gangster has powerfull political influence who controls chennai City for more than 25 years with not having single f.i.r filed against Him. Being targeted by a suo-motto case. To nab him, government Appoints a lady i.p.s officer thigazh bharathi in an undercover Operation. In the meantime his subordinates, business partners & rival Gangs also trying to kill him. How i.p.s officer thigazh bharathi Achieved her mission completed and defeated poongavanam’s regine Is the remaining story.
title: Madharas Mafia Company

overview: An unsuspecting cab driver takes up a petty job, only to fall into the deadly trap of a ruthless gangster. Now, he must fight for surviva or accept that he was born to be hunted
title: Dawood

overview: On the edge of a misty hilltop in rural Kerala, a young man named Arjun prepares to end his life. It’s the day of his beloved Anu’s wedding—an unbearable moment for a heart that had loved silently and shattered quietly.
title: Athi Bheekara Kaamukan

overview: A journey of facing life’s twists & tests with laughter and love!
title: Santhana Prapthirasthu

overview: A new film by Sheik Althaf Hussain. The plot is unknown at this moment; currently in private screenings and festival submissions.
title: Spirit of the Flesh

overview: Set in the backdrop of a film set, in the 1950’s in post colonial Madras, the film is centred around the professional rivalry between a film-maker trying to make his seminal film and the top reigning actor who the director once introduced. The rivalry spirals around the leading actress, a debutante and as the relationship between the three.
title: Kaantha

overview: A lonely widowed retiree marries a much younger woman despite his children's disapproval.  Plotting to kill him for insurance money, his kids are thrown into chaos when he dies  unexpectedly, leaving them to face the fallout of their own schemes.
title: Enuguthondam Ghatikachalam

overview: When Prashanth, a 21-year-old with the eerie power to step into photographs and relive the moments within them, finally thinks he’s escaped the chaos of his past, he’s pulled into a new nightmare. A warped dimension ruled by his sinister lookalike. As reality and illusion blur, an assassin named Arjun closes in on him in the real world.  Trapped between timelines, hunted in both worlds and losing control of his own mind, Prashanth must uncover the truth before the shutter closes for good.
title: Shutter : The Final Chapter

overview: a filmmaker setting out to capture the life of demolition worker, an immigrant whose close friends and fellow workers went missing. As the filmmaker attempts to do so, the production faces many symbolic and frustrating obstacles in between. Disheartened, the filmmaker departs the site—defeated, exhausted, and grieving the story they couldn’t tell.
title: Hypothesis of Barrier Agreed Upon

overview: A renowned YouTuber and single mother's romance with a celebrity author sparks turmoil in her fractured family, forcing her teenage daughter to confront past wounds—until an unexpected act of sacrifice heals long-broken bonds.
title: Malaki Duwe Numba

overview: A boy struggles to express his love to a girl he loves deeply, but she fails to understand his mental state. The burning flame in a loving heart seeks solitude and comfort, making it difficult to express emotions through words.
title: Premistunnaa

overview: What happens when one man starts seeing everyone’s future? A hilarious socio-fantasy ride filled with chaos, charm, and twists of fate!
title: Chiranjeeva

overview: Born a girl but raised as a boy, Aravan is groomed by her father to play Duryodhana in their village therukoothu. Torn between the role imposed upon her and the identity she longs to embrace, Aravan's inner world begins to unravel. Drawing from both Sanskrit and Tamil epics, Lament is a poignant exploration of gender, tradition, and the cost of silencing one's true self.
title: Lament

overview: An intense love story brews between Deva and Bindhu. On the other side, a masked man who calls himself GOD shakes the city with his brutal serial killings.
title: I Am God

overview: What can even go wrong when Mr. G. R Indugopan tries starting his morning productive by finishing his writing assignments, when a self-proclaimed "fan" barges into his workspace, asking unwanted questions !?
title: The Writer's Room

overview: A young couple navigates the chaotic world of pre-wedding photography, facing unexpected hurdles and family drama as they try to capture their perfect moments before tying the knot.
title: The Great Pre-Wedding Show

overview: Kathirvelan is in love with Cristina . Both are give their documents to the witnesses for the registered marriage of the sister of the rowdy. In it, the hero and heroine who gave the documents to the witnesses receive a wrong marriage certificate as if they were married. The heroine Cristina is engaged to marry a stranger. Kathir fights and join.
title: Cristina Kathirvelan

overview: Parrisu is a tamil movie starring Jaanvekaa Subramaniam and Kiran Pradeep  in prominent roles. It is directed by Kala Alluri.
title: Parrisu

overview: Kathiravan raises three orphans—Sathya, Surya, and Shiva—as his own, grooming them to unknowingly support his illegal mushroom drug empire. Despite being used as pawns, the trio remains loyal out of love. After killing his former boss and seizing control of the business, Kathiravan earns the wrath of Radha, the boss’s widow, who plots revenge. Meanwhile, Varsha, a local woman and love interest of Sathya, plans to transfer her estate to its workers. Threatened by this, Kathiravan manipulates the employees, turning them against her. As Varsha’s life hangs in the balance, Sathya and Radha must confront Kathiravan—leading to a climactic reckoning.
title: Vattakhanal

overview: A detective investigates alarming health issues in IVF babies, revealing a dark plot involving illegal steroids, mystery donors, and corrupt fertility clinics - all orchestrated by someone exploiting people's desire for children.
title: Others

overview: Ajith, a romantic dreamer faces reality when forced to work at a matchmaking agency under Anjali,a pragmatic, grounded woman, devoid of dreamy illusions. Their conflicting ideologies become the foundation of a relationship that’s as charming as it is unfiltered.
title: Aaromaley

overview: Shiva, a rational ghost hunter, man of science and reason—is drawn back to the mystery of a powerful guardian spirit named Dhanapisachi, pulled into a world where his beliefs are tested.
title: Jatadhara

overview: On his way to a long-overdue drinking party with two friends, Anish receives an unexpected call from Anjana, a past lover visiting the city. Their decision to meet sets the stage for an evening of easy banter, reopened wounds, and difficult choices.
title: Ithiri Neram

overview: Bhooma Devi, a diligent postgraduate literature student reluctantly agrees to date the college bad boy Vikram, but her life unravels, when the typical college romance gradually evolves into a deeply layered exploration of love and his controlling nature takes over.
title: The Girlfriend

overview: Vinod, 29, is a man of routine. Living in Karunagappally and working at the Planning Office in Thiruvananthapuram, he spends his days in a carefully controlled cycle of train commutes, meticulous work, and an almost obsessive adherence to order.
title: Innocent

overview: Kerala, with its lush landscapes, has seen many migrate abroad for work, creating local labor shortages filled by distant migrants. These workers endure isolation, discrimination and uncertainty, often overlooked beyond their labour. Yet, amid struggle, they forge bonds, share stories, and discover solace in fleeting joys.
title: See Me, When You Leave

overview: A boy and a girl meet unexpectedly in metro, going forward unknowingly they develop feelings for each other, how will their inner self make them realise they are in love, will they confess their feelings.
title: Metro Kadhal

overview: Set in a small, vibrant village, Oru Onnonnara Ottam follows the hilarious journey of three youngsters running a struggling event management business. When their warehouse owner demands overdue rent, they finally find hope in a cousin’s upcoming wedding — but things take a wild turn when the bride suddenly elopes !
title: Oru Onnonnara Ottam

overview: A son’s rebellion against his father’s strict moral code leads to a tense adventure. Kristy challenges Constable Mahadevaiah’s unwavering honesty as he pursues his own path.
title: Brat

overview: Ravi is a Theyyam artist. While tying Theyyam in a temple, Ravi, under the influence of a feeling kills a bystander, Thangam Satheesan, with a spear in his hand. When he regains consciousness after untying the Theyyam, Ravi is unable to accept the truth that he is a murderer. Even though he repeatedly claims that he did not do it. Since the circums
title: COMONDRA ALIEN

overview: Three aspiring filmmakers from a humble brick kiln background set out to prove their talent. After their first village drama is dismissed as outdated, they decide to reinvent themselves. What begins as a daring YouTube channel sting soon spirals into danger, loss, and a shocking revelation—with twists and turns—all part of their bold second film. Their vision ultimately wins over the producer, marking the true beginning of their filmmaking journey.
title: THADAI ATHAI UDAI

overview: A year into their marriage, unable to distinguish between toxicity and mere misunderstandings, Sakthi decides to part ways with Siva. The couple navigate their separation, and whether they ultimately proceed with divorce forms the emotional climax.
title: Aan Paavam Pollathathu

overview: A transport officer battles a violent drug lord and his criminal clan.
title: Mass Jathara

overview: A struggling writer announces he'll commit the perfect crime, sparking a tense pursuit as police try to prevent his methodically planned killing spree.
title: Aaryan

overview: Explores Different Shades Of Human Desire Through Jessie, Ilyas, Samuel, And Bhaskaran - Each Chasing Passion, Longing, Or Curiosity In Their Own Way, Revealing How Desires Shape Life And Lead To Self-Realisation.
title: Madhuram Jeevamruthabindu

overview: In the quiet village of 'Muppathen Kambom', a retired footballer takes it upon himself to train a group of local boys, using sport as a path to discipline and hope. But their journey is threatened by a ruthless syndicate that exploits uneducated youth for profit, dragging them into a life of corruption. As the stakes rise, the Coach and his team must fight not just for victory on the court, but for the future of their community.
title: Irudhi Strike

overview: A school boy being questioned by his teacher- his first bitter lesson in social discrimination. As he struggles to understand this silent injustice, he begins to see the world through new, questioning eyes.
title: Da'Lit Kids

overview: On a war-torn evening, young Vendan watches his parents’ bitter fight at his grandmother’s home. His mother, weary of neglect, resolves to leave and his father’s threats force her to escape alone into the night. The next morning, Vendan searches for clues of their mother’s fate – shattered glass, bicycle tracks or a body.
title: The Last Endless Night

overview: The film follows Suresh, a percussionist who moved to Hyderabad in 1997 during the Human Rights and Dalit Rights movement. Despite deep musical knowledge, he struggles for recognition, performing mainly at public meetings and political gatherings. His artistry remains unacknowledged, as he sings and plays with quiet persistence, yearning for his voice to be heard.
title: Cuckoo Sings Spring, Unheard

overview: A process of self-purification through the removal of sludge and rocks from a well, symbolizing a quest for clarity and connection to the natural world. The project explores themes of healing and grace, suggesting that nature, like people, is capable of forgiveness and restoration.
title: The Well

overview: Rohan's affluent lifestyle spirals out of control as he becomes convinced there is a supernatural entity in his home. As he starts to uncover the mystery, he is drawn into unexpected worlds and alliances, along with the horrors that lie ahead.
title: Diés Iraé

overview: When a mysterious child is found by a tribal couple near a roaring waterfall, they raise him as their own. As he grows, Sivudu is drawn to the world beyond the cliffs, where he discovers the ancient kingdom of Mahishmati, ruled by a cruel tyrant, haunted by rebellion, and bound to his past. What begins as a quest for love soon unravels a legacy of betrayal, sacrifice, and a forgotten prince.
title: Bāhubali: The Epic

overview: When Darshan forgets his lunch, his cousin Dheena decides to deliver it himself — a small gesture that speaks volumes about their bond.
title: The Tiffin Box

overview: A drama of betrayal and redemption when a risky plan leaves four smugglers trapped by fate.
title: JUNCTION

overview: In the beach of Pondicherry, Kev and Ruby’s love awakens an ancient shell — every wish a whisper to the hidden tides.
title: Fossil

overview: Protagonist, meets his school friend unexpectedly after a long time at a local cafe. Where they chit chat about protagonist's rough college past.
title: Men will be Men

overview: Two IT professionals, Balu and Ritha, face unforeseen challenges that test their relationship after their recent marriage.
title: Cherukkanum Pennum

overview: Shiva, a 27-year-old manager, uncovers exploitation of local weavers in a failing silk saree cooperative. With the help of a girlfriend and friends, he confronts corrupt businessmen and establishes Dharmavaram sarees as an authentic brand.
title: Dharmavaram

overview: Green is a gripping psychological thriller set against the backdrop of a mysterious, terrifying forest. As the protagonist descends deeper into isolation and fear, the forest grows darker, blurring the line between reality and delusion. Intense and thought-provoking, Green is a must-watch for fans of psychological, mind-bending thrillers.
title: Green

overview: Soman, who plays the trumpet in the Cannoli bandset, works at the local lime kiln.He is in love with a girl named Chempakam from the same village Chempakam’s marriage had been fixed with her maternal uncle’s son, Madhavan, who is a policeman. When Madhavan realizes that Chempakam is in love with Soman, he conspires with the mill owner to kill Soman
title: KANOLI BANDSET

overview: Nellikampoil, a village adjacent to Forest, is very common. Many strange events are taking place in this land full of many myths. A figure with the legs of a horse and the body of a man is filling the land with fear by hanging a chicken head in the houses and hiding it in darkness and fear.
title: Nellikkampoyil Night Riders

overview: A man’s absurd act of turning his flashlight on and off spirals into an eerie repetitive phantasmagoria.
title: Flashlight

original_title: Dear Jeeva: An Unconditional Love Story
overview: Jeeva,a next-door guy who is seeking a job and living alone and Ms Jeeva is a focused workaholic. When they met for an interview, they began to like each other and fell in love.After a lot of emotional journey, both got married and started their lives happily. However, after a few months of marriage, Jeeva lost his job. Mrs. Jeeva received an onsite opportunity simultaneously.Ego starts to build between them and at one point Mrs. Jeeva wants to distance herself from him, but The news of Covid-lockdown has left them with no choice but to stay together.The rest of the story is about how situations during the lockdown helped them understand each other, whether they separated or accepted each other.
title: Dear Jeeva: An Unconditional Love Story

overview: A new bride has to deal with her overly conservative husband's demands on that 'auspicious' day.
title: Erra Mandaram

overview: Kumar, a spoiled rich kid who lives life by his own rules, falls in love with Mercy, a beautiful girl with a big secret, while attending university in Kerala.
title: K-Ramp

overview: Over the course of a single day, a jobless compulsive gambler finds his world spiraling out of control when a noise at his door draws him into a dangerous confrontation that blurs the line between debt and survival. The film follows Daniel, a jobless compulsive gambler whose life revolves around the instant gratification of online betting. One seemingly ordinary day, while his wife and child are away, Daniel’s monotonous gambling routine is interrupted by a sharp, unexplained noise at his doorstep. What begins as mild curiosity spirals into a tense and unpredictable encounter, as he is confronted by unexpected visitors who draw him into a dangerous game far beyond the digital realm.
title: Game of Loans

overview: What happens when a smooth-talking thief decides to upgrade his hustle?  He cons his way to divinity! This hilarious satire follows a lovable rogue who scams his way through society, faces wild challenges, and somehow ends up a revered godman with his own private island. Welcome to a world where faith meets fraud—loudly and comically!
title: Kambi Katna Kathai

overview: Childhood friends Agan and Kural are inseparable. When Kural encounters romantic troubles, Agan must balance his hidden feelings for her with his desire to ensure her happiness.
title: Dude

overview: At Anakkara Police Station, probationary SI Jancy and constable Hareesh do not get along well. The main reason is Hareesh’s immature attitude towards women. Both of them are also struggling with problems in their family lives. One night, while on patrol together, an unexpected incident turns their lives upside down. The chain of events that follows
title: Paathirathri

overview: A young man fights to overcome violence plaguing his village and succeed as a professional kabaddi player.
title: Bison Kaalamaadan

overview: During the 1980s, Manoharan was a leader in the city's crude oil smuggling business. Manohar opposed Patanis dream of setting up a private port that would become a hub for the black market oil trade. He looted a large quantity of oil from the pipeline to blackmail the government into fulfilling his dream. Finally, the Vasu finds the missing oil.
title: Diesel

overview: A couple of amateur sleuths attempt to solve the mystery behind disappearing pets, but become embroiled in far more sinister crimes.
title: The Pet Detective

overview: The lives of a group of misfit friends become chaotic after one of them falls for a politician's daughter.
title: Mithra Mandali

overview: Upcoming short film.
title: Cracked Plugins

overview: In this heartwarming and thought-provoking drama,Pavani,a talented Indian classical dancer,navigates the complexities of marriage,identity,and ambition. Her seemingly perfect life with Ramesh,an American-based entrepreneur,unravels as his traditional values clash with her artistic dreams. As Pavani confronts infertility,societal pressures,
title: Andhela Ravamidhi

overview: A ruthless education empire heir and a compassionate orphanage worker clash when a woman reveals the heir's hidden past, leading to a violent confrontation.
title: Rambo

overview: Will, Amid a Ghost Employment Scam, a Determined Daughter Races to Prove Her Father’s Innocence, Only to Be Trapped in a Gripping Mystery After a Financier’s Sudden Death.
title: Will

overview: Irudhi Muyarchi is a Tamil movie starring Ranjith and Meghali Meenakshi in prominent roles. It is written and directed by Venkat Janaa.
title: Irudhi Muyarchi

overview: Kanniyappan, A Hardworking Farmer, Is Devastated When He Learns That His Ancestral Farmland Has Been Auctioned Off Due To An Unpaid Loan. Despite Being A Diligent Farmer, Kanniyappan Is Shocked Because He Never Took Out Any Loan From A Bank Or Any Financial Institution. His Peaceful Life Takes A Dark Turn As He Begins To Unravel The Truth Behind This Mysterious Auction.
title: Marutham

overview: Set against the serene yet fragile landscape of Kanjirappally, Hidden Tremors is a deeply personal and emotionally resonant portrait of a community in transition. As frequent landslides and subtle seismic shifts threaten both land and life, a quieter crisis unfolds within a family struggling to hold on — to land, to memory, and to each other. Through evocative performances, the film captures the emotional depth of separation, resilience, and longing.
title: Hidden Tremors

overview: A drunken man's encounter sets off a chain of gossip in a town of secrets. As whispers spread, a woman's hidden past threatens to tear everything apart.
title: Avihitham

overview: Gowtham a ruthless heir to an education empire and Ram, a kind hearted orphanage caretaker, are raised with opposing beliefs. When Malar exposes Gowtham's dark secret, the two men face off in a brutal test of power and fists.
title: Rambo

overview: Against the beautiful backdrop of Konaseema, India, Sasi and Raghava fall in love. Their romantic journey is a timeless tale of innocence, love and pain.
title: Sasivadane

overview: In a village where Thampachi and Komaras are believed to be the counterparts of God, everyone respects Shiva Thampachi and his daughter Shivani. Unexpectedly, a job offer comes in search of Shivani.
title: Thampachi

overview: The story explores about the liberation and freedom of a Nun, where she wants to live like a normal woman but society and the family around her makes it difficult, finally what happens to her at the end.
title: Maria

overview: A rich man, driven by greed, kidnaps a poor boy from his home. After two days, the boy wakes to find his sexual organ has been stolen.
title: EMPTY BAG

overview: A young couple, full of excitement and love, heads out for what they believe will be a magical, romantic evening. The night begins with laughter, soft music, and a cozy dinner, setting the stage for the perfect date. However, as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected events—ranging from misunderstandings to tragic encounters—unravel the evening. What seemed like a simple night of romance quickly spirals into a nightmare, leaving the couple in a place they never imagined they'd be. The story explores the fragility of love and how even the happiest moments can take a devastating turn, forever changing their relationship and their lives.
title: fish fry

overview: A simple man's search for success leads him to rediscover his roots.
title: Idli Kadai

overview: During the Kadamba reign, King Vijayendra, the ruler of the fictional feudatory land of Bangra, meets his final fate while venturing into the mystical forest of Kantara. Witnessing this, his son Rajashekara seals the borders of their realm. Later, Prince Kulashekara reopens them through a brutal massacre. The protagonist, Berme, in search of prosperity, crosses the divide and ignites a conflict of faith, power, and destiny between the Kingdom and Nature.
title: Kantara - A Legend: Chapter 1

overview: The story centers on Chinnu, a young man who finds a strange paper left near his home. Initially dismissing it as a childish prank, he is lured to a distant location, only to discover the paper was actually left by his long-lost, dearest friend.
title: Hide and Seek

overview: Lost in the endless tide of the city's nature, Stephen drifts between survival and surrender, tethered only by the fragile echoes of a far away home that still calls to him from afar.
title: Vandu

overview: A tragic car crash leaves a wealthy couple stranded on a remote road. Seeking shelter in a secluded house, they uncover dark secrets and become entangled in a deadly game of murder, deception, and revenge-where nothing is as it seems.
title: Kalaratri

overview: How would 4 psychos celebrate Onam? How would they make their Sadya special? Have you ever thought about that?
title: Maveli Naduvaneedum Kalam

overview: Story of an "ordinary man" and his recollection of his night
title: After Midnight

overview: A brief introduction about Cinema and Wrapped YT channel
title: Wrapped-Oru Arimugam

overview: A desperate father searching for his missing son finds himself trapped inside a police station when a mysterious entity seals the station building, forcing those within to confront their secrets as a deadly game.
title: Right

overview: Kutram Thavir is about Rudra, whose elder sister dies due to a fraudulent medical insurance scheme, leading him to discover a conspiracy that exploits the poor. Driven by grief and anger, Rudra seeks revenge and exposes the truth behind his sister's death.
title: Kutram Thavir

overview: In a village where wedding sabotage is a competitive sport, the members of the Valsala Club bet that they can get a wedding completed within a week to end the tradition
title: Valsala Club

overview: A star kabaddi player's life takes a dangerous turn when he's pulled into the criminal underworld.
title: Balti

original_title: Once upon a time in Trivandrum
overview: At first, it looks like just another ordinary day in Trivandrum. But as the day goes on, five very different stories start to unfold — each with its own unique characters and funny situations.What makes it more interesting is that all these stories, though separate, are secretly connected by one strange and mysterious painting.
title: Once upon a time in Trivandrum

overview: Former Indian military officer Dev Mahendran and his family find themselves in a perilous situation in a foreign country, Lenarco, during an international conference.
title: Karam

overview: Passingness is a haunting exploration of identity, memory, and the fragile edge of reality. As the narrative unfolds through emotionally charged performances and a tense, introspective atmosphere, the audience is drawn into a fragile space between being and disappearing. A haunting meditation on identity, loneliness, and the terror of not being seen. Driven by intense, intimate performances, the story unfolds in layers of psychological tension, revealing inner scars, blurred truths, and the quiet terror of not knowing who you are or if you ever were.
title: Passingness

overview: Sundar is on a quest to solve the puzzle of his father's life. His search leads him to his father's filmmaking dreams and a secret half-sister whose mother was the lead actress in B-grade films.
title: Lights, Camera, Achhan

overview: A writer's creations step out of his stories, haunting his reality and demanding justice. As fiction and truth collide, he becomes a prisoner in a terrifying narrative beyond his control.
title: Trikaali

overview: Portrays a couple form Kerala who lost their house during harsh winter days while trying settle down in Delhi, building a bond amid challenges in a strange city.
title: If on a Winter's Night

overview: Arasayyana Prema Prasanga is a Kannada comedy-drama about Arasayya, a simple man whose search for love and family harmony sparks hilarious misunderstandings, heartfelt moments, and a warm celebration of promises and relationships.
title: Arasayyana Prema Prasanga

overview: A moving and suspenseful tale of a father`s unshakable love. When his daughter suddenly goes missing, his world is turned upside down. What begins as a desperate search soon becomes a gripping journey filled with questions of trust, innocence, and the true meaning of unconditional love. A film that belongs to everyone, Beauty explores a parent`s relentless hope and the lengths they will go to for their child.
title: Beauty

overview: A moving and suspenseful tale of a father's unshakable love. When his daughter suddenly goes missing, his world is turned upside down. What begins as a desperate search soon becomes a gripping journey filled with questions of trust, innocence, and the true meaning of unconditional love. A film that belongs to everyone, Beauty explores a parent's relentless hope and the lengths they will go to for their child.
title: Beauty

overview: Odiyangam traces the origin of the very first Odiyan—a figure woven into Kerala’s folklore—interweaving romance and vengeance with an immersive audiovisual experience .
title: Odiyangam

overview: A single-shot roller coaster journey of a man racing against time and love, a bold cinematic experiment that captures an unbroken 100-minute ride - with friendship, madness, and raw emotion.
title: Ilanti Cinema Meereppudu Chusundaru

overview: Aakash, a 9-year-old boy is subjected to physical violence at school by his Math teacher and ends up hiding it from his strict but caring mother. When tragedy arises, irreplaceable bonds are forged between Aakash, his mother and his innocent younger brother, Adi in this tender family drama set in the 90s Bangalore.
title: Don't Tell Mother

overview: A tribal woman is brutally assaulted and killed. Her newborn is mercilessly abandoned in a dump yard, left to die. But fate intervenes — an old man discovers the infant and decides to raise him as his own. The child, named Kittu,After the old man’s death, Kittu is left to fend for himself,determined to confront his mother’s killer.
title: Shakthi Thirumagan

overview: A woman joins forces with a journalist to investigate secrets her fiancé was keeping from her after she is informed he has died in a tragic train accident.
title: Mirage

overview: A musician is gifted with the supernatural ability to see a couple's destiny whenever they kiss. But when he sees the grim fate of the woman he loves, he must use his powers to defy destiny itself.
title: Kiss

overview: After losing his forest ranger position, a Tamil villager pursues his dream of joining the Indian Army, only to face harsh realities that challenge his idealistic vision of military service.
title: Thandakaaranyam

overview: Following their wedding, Purushu struggles to take an antique-style bangle off Sarla's wrist, as it leads to significant conflict and misunderstanding.
title: Vala: Story of a Bangle

original_title: Dalit Subbaiah: Voice of the Rebels
overview: Dalit Subbaiah, directed by Giridharan MKP and produced by Yaazhi Films in collaboration with Pa. Ranjith's Neelam Productions, won the Best Longform Documentary Award at the 17th International Documentary and Short Film Festival of Kerala (IDSFFK). The film traces Subbaiah's life and struggles, celebrating his legacy in revolutionary music and activism
title: Dalit Subbaiah: Voice of the Rebels

overview: Short play on when a couple grows too comfortable with each other, difficult questions begin to surface, echoing between the present and the future. But will they ever find the answer to the ultimate question: What is love?
title: Unn Kangalin Vattathil Naan

overview: "Ivan's Day is a short film that captures a single day in Ivan's life, where unexpected moments unfold."
title: Ivan's Day

overview: Making your kite is the new Pendidikan Seni Visual task. As Santosh’s favourite subject is it, he excites to make and show it to his friends. He wants to fly the kite but rain becomes a hurdle for it. However, the rain itself gifted him an unexpected surprise which helps him for his science subject.
title: Sprout

overview: Struggling with chronic insomnia and inner turmoil, Dhruvas life spirals until he meets Riddhima, whose presence offers him a fleeting sense of calm. As their connection grows, he finds himself torn between holding onto the solace she brings and facing the haunting fears that threaten to consume him.  `Nidradevi Next Door` weaves a darkly humorous and emotionally compelling tale of love, healing, and the lengths one will go to find inner peace.
title: Nidradevi Next Door
